snippet.title: The Chameleon - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
A tense exploration game with super-powers, set in the 70s, filled with glorious fat pixels.

Transform into enemies, dash away, teleport and create objects to hide behind or block paths in this stealth retro game.
